articles.title: Apple reportedly revamping Health app to add an AI coach - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is developing a new version of its Health app that includes an AI coach that can advise users on how to get healthier, according to Bloomberg’s Mark
articles.content:
Apple is developing a new version of its Health app that includes an AI coach that can advise users on how to get healthier, according to Bloombergs Mark Gurman.
